name: Tales From the Lab (FULL GAME)
description:
Welcome to the full version of Tales from the Lab!

In tales from the lab, you play as a trainee scientist working at Furr. Co. Labs. Your job is to create animal-esque supersoldiers called Latex beasts. However, just as things seem peachy, all hell breaks loose.

AVERAGE PLAYTIME
1-2  Hours

CONTROLS
Z/Enter - Select

X - Backspace/Menu

Arrow Keys - Movement (Supports diagonal movement, click to move is not recommended.)

ALL "CHANGED" RELATED PROPERTIES BELONG TO DRAGONSNOW! PLEASE SUPPORT THE OFFICIAL RELEASE OF "CHANGED" ON THEIR PATREON!
Dragon Snow is creating games/software | Patreon
